Posts.Text: Today was a hectic day. I'm so drained I'm just gonna go to sleep.
Today was a better. I had so much fun! I'm so happy...
I've been craving chocolate all day today. I'm gonna go get some candy from the store. I'm gonna get fat off chocolate today :(
Dear diary today was an okay day.
Dear diary I want to go on a vacation
Dear diary I went to a really pretty restaurant today
